snippet.title: Wands Alliances - teaser trailer - out 2022 on Meta Quest 2
snippet.description:
Today, Cortopia and Beyond Frames announced it is bringing magic mayhem to Meta Quest 2 with their newest VR game Wands® Alliances. Wands Alliances will take the original high paced magic and wand wielding franchise to the next level with team-based 3v3 gameplay, set in a Victorian-era London. 

Players will need to strategically plan their load-outs and tactically utilize their play space and covers to achieve victory against their opponents.
 
Cortopia will reveal more about the evolution of the Wands franchise in the months leading up to the release. Wielders can read more on https://www.wandsgame.com/
